summary: Reclusive vampires lounge in a lonely American town. They wear sun cream to protect themselves. A descendant of Van Helsing arrives with hilarious consequences.
cast: David Carradine|Morgan Brittany|Bruce Campbell|Jim Metzler|Maxwell Caulfield|Deborah Foreman|M. title: Vampiros a la sombra
